COMMERCE MARKETPLACE
Patch Notes for Commerce Marketplace Spring’ 23

These patch releases are available for Commerce Marketplace. All patches contain fixes that are automatically upgraded when a new Commerce Marketplace version is installed. Each patch also contains fixes from the previous Commerce Marketplace Winter ’23 (version 2.49) patches, so you don’t need to complete previous upgrades to install this patch build.

TIP
Use the URL link https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=codPackage to update your Commerce Marketplace. Substitute “yoursite” for your Salesforce instance and add the code of the package sent to you to the end of the link.
On the Update Commerce Marketplace page, select Install for Admins Only.
Check the box to acknowledge the installation process.
Click Update.
2.59— February 7, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB87QAG
ID	FIX
W-12499195	Reenabled the Commerce Marketplace - Product Match flow in the Managed Package.
2.58—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB6kQAG
ID	FIX
W-11343392	Changed the entry criteria on the Commerce Marketplace - Create Related Category at Product Creation flow to match the existing Product’s record type Marketplace.
W-11982997	Created two flows to change the seller’s user permission set when the seller’s status is approved: Commerce Marketplace - Change Permission Set Owner to Queue and Commerce Marketplace - Change Permission Set. Also changed the class to SellerApprovedValidation.
W-12227874	

Changed the flow Commerce Marketplace - Assign Case Owner flow to consider three factors when assigning the record owner.

If the case record is related to a seller record
If Enable Default Case Queues is selected on Marketplace Configurations
If the Marketplace Order field is filled

After considering these factors, the resulting owner of the case record must be either the user that created the record, the Marketplace Support queue, the Marketplace Support Exception queue, or the seller’s record owner.


W-12280425	Created an Apex method to delete records from the product completeness before a queueable class is called.
W-12360742	Created a validation to inform the user when the .csv file used in the Import Wizard had a formatting problem.
2.57—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB58QAG
ID	FIX
W-12111491	Changed the code of the case apex class to a flow. Added new criteria to inform if the cases created should be redirected to the owner of the seller object register, the Marketplace support exception queue, or the Marketplace support queue.
W-12144526	Created a validation in the Import Wizard component that verifies whether the price book exists when importing the price book entry.
W-12152463	Removed the Profile Name of the User object, from the query that is made to check access permissions to Image records because it’s not used. Added ImageController to allowed classes on the Seller Permission Set.
W-12220528	Merged the content of the Category Config Attributes and View Category Attributes displays to create a single display, Category Config Attributes.
2.56—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB3lQAG
ID	FIX
W-12028374	Altered the Import Wizard progress bar so that it would show the development of the data imported in percentage.
W-12030507	Added two fields in the Marketplace Configuration object: Unique_Marketplace__c, which has the value of the Marketplace Id, and Unique_Commerce_Cloud_SiteID__c, which is required for ecommerce.
W-12073874	Added the Disable Case Trigger field on the Marketplace Configuration object to let you decide whether the system uses the default Marketplace Support and Marketplace Support Exception queues.
2.55—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB2xQAG
ID	FIX
W-12009272	Changed the criteria to calculate the KPI Incident Rate on case records related to a seller record.
2.53—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB1VQAW
ID	FIX
W-11933259	Changed the scope, the input and output parameters, and the main action of the SelfRegistrationUserHandlerNew class to global so that it can be cloned and used in another flow.
W-11934323	Changed the Apex Classes linked to the Simplified Catalog Import component so that it receives the Security.stripnaccessible parameters, which enforces field- and object-level data protection.
2.52—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZB0hQAG
ID	FIX
W-11903050	Organized the double-boxed list so that it appears in alphabetical order in the Category Attribute Configuration component.
W-11910596	Removed the Marketplace Integration permission set from the package.
2.51—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZAygQAG
ID	FIX
W-11808819	Added “(Deprecated)” to the Import Data button label and removed it from the List View’s available buttons on the Product, Product_Variant, Manufacturer, and Category objects.
W-11809167	Added the fields “Approval Status” and “Record Type field” in the Record and List View of the Marketplace Product object.
W-11809374	Added “(Deprecated)” to the field label Seller Accepts Marketplace Shipping.
W-11825336	Changed the lookup from "record type id" to "record type developer name" on the Product and Product Match Suggestion objects.
W-11830868	

Updated the Payment Lot layout, changing the related list from Payment Financial Transactions to Financial Transactions.

Created the Commerce Marketplace - Payment Lot Validation on Transaction flow, which allows blocking the editing of payment lot transactions according to the users’ pre-defined criteria. To apply this block, created the ValidationError__c field on financial transactions.

Created the Commerce Marketplace - Update Payment Lot Total Value flow, which updates the payment lot total value based on financial addition and deduction transactions.

Created the Payment Lot field Total_Value__c.

Created validation rules on financial transactions to avoid payment lot changes in InvalidPaymentLotStatus, InvalidStatusToAddPaymentLot, and StatusValidation.


W-11835337	Ensured that the Product Completeness record is deleted before creating another one.
W-11857980	Fixed the bug that prevented the creation of multiple registers of products and variants simultaneously.
W-11872471	Changed the scope of the Slug class from public to global.
W-11882080	Fixed the bug that generated the message “Warning” when the Self Registration flow was cloned, by altering the parameters of the Self Registration class from public to global.
2.50—January 11, 2023
Sandbox org URL
https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001hiiGQAQ
ID	FIX
W-11798543	Changed the order of updates in the match suggestion approval. Removed a condition in the product match Apex classes so that match suggestions were automatically created.
W-11802145	Fixed the bug that duplicated an attribute of the product category after approval.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Commerce Marketplace Patch Notes Spring 2023
